topics.body:
I know that this would probably be more appropriate for another thread, but I hate it when I find an artist I like, develop a burning question that I just _have_ to ask them, go to their Tumblr page, and click on the "Ask Me Anything" button...

...only to find out that you have to log in to Tumblr in order to ask them anything.

I _hate_ that shit. I mean, don't get me wrong. I understand why artists might do it- to keep anons from spamming them with annoying/stupid questions or fetish requests, for instance- but it's still _really_ annoying when that happens.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f61f116368721e8b130000#post_53f61f116368721e8b130000

just register.

topics.body: I just found out that the Writer for Digimon tamers and Lain created Ultraman Gaia...I wonder why no one has subbed it?

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f6299463687252ef140000#post_53f6299463687252ef140000
Wait, Seriously?

That's odd? The guy moved on from Digimon to Ultraman?

That's pretty interesting. (Digimon Tamers was my favorite Digimon)
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f62a8e636872164ed40000#post_53f62a8e636872164ed40000
He actually did Gaia first.

Besides the Cosmic horror card being played a bit too often, (Which is necessary due to the nature of the plot) It's apparently quite good.

You have two ultramen, Gaia, The hero, And Agul, An Anti-Hero who wants to save only the earth. (And doesn't care about Humanity)

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f62a8e636872164ed40000#post_53f62a8e636872164ed40000
Personally I didn't really like tamers as much as other gens.

The thing I personally like about digimon is that each digimon can digivolve into a bunch of other digimon and in some generations tamers can digivolve into digimon and that the digimon actually do evolve.  What I mean by this is that omnimon in the original by frontier was no longer a big deal.  Also in one generation the Yddra computer wiped out almost all digimon with a virus and some digimon developed a immunity to the virus.

Why?  Cause large houses are a pain in the ass to clean, too expensive and I hate mowing the yard but I love swimming.

topics.body:
So I had the most weirdest match in UMVC3 today.

This guy was really good and I was having so much fun, getting back in the groove!

All of a sudden he literally stops playing, and just taunts through the whole game and starts letting me win four times in a row.

And then sends me a message saying "Happy now?" and then leaves.

I literally was so confused and unsatisfied I stopped playing.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
